description: Simple raster graphics image format, designed by Microsoft to store device-independent 2D images.  Used primarily for icons and other purposes associated with the Windows graphical interface and system functions.
name: Microsoft Windows Bitmap Format (BMP), version 5
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">bmp</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
